scripts.start: npm run build; k6 run dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.start:debug: npm run build; k6 run --http-debug dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.start:smoke: npm run build; k6 run -e profile=smoke dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.start:load: npm run build; k6 run -e profile=load dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.start:stress: npm run build; k6 run -e profile=stress dist/app.bundle.js
scripts.start:soak: npm run build; k6 run -e profile=soak dist/app.bundle.js
